meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Melissa Fall Tal Kedem Lisa Kristina Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7645.

td.p: Melissa Fall, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Tal Kedem, an attorney from New York, New York
Lisa Kristina, a freelance musician from Chicago Heights, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,900)

tr.td: THRILLERS & MYSTERIES
BEASTLY GLOSSARY
3 CONSECUTIVE VOWELS
U.S. LANDMARKS
FITNESS
NEW GAME VERSIONS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Melissa: What is a train?)
(Tal: What is an ocean liner?)
(Alex: No, they won\'t give it to you.)
[Tal originally ruled incorrect; ruled correct during the contestant interviews]

a cruise ship

TalMelissa
')
